meanings.definition: The front of a building or structure that receives sunlight.
meanings.sent1: The lightfaces of the house glowed in the morning sun.
meanings.sent2: The lightfaces of the office building shone brightly in the afternoon.
meanings.sent3: The lightfaces of the school building seemed to smile as the sun touched them.
meanings.sent4: The lightfaces of the skyscraper reached out to the sun, embracing its warmth.
meanings.sent5: The lightfaces of the church were like a canvas for the sun's painting.

meanings.definition: A typeface with thin strokes and open letterforms.
meanings.sent1: The designer chose a lightfaces font for the logo.
meanings.sent2: The book cover used a lightfaces typeface for the title.
meanings.sent3: The lightfaces font on the poster made the text easy to read.
meanings.sent4: The lightfaces typeface gave the menu a modern look.
meanings.sent5: The lightfaces letters on the sign stood out against the dark background.

meanings.definition: A person with a cheerful or positive demeanor.
meanings.sent1: She was known in the office as a lightfaces, always smiling and encouraging others.
meanings.sent2: The lightfaces in the group always brought a positive energy to meetings.
meanings.sent3: Even on a rainy day, he was a lightfaces, spreading joy with his jokes.
